mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reports (reporter_id, post_id, reason, status) VALUES (#{reporterId}, #{postId}, #{reason}, 'pending')
INSERT INTO reports (reporter_id, user_id, reason, status) VALUES (#{reporterId}, #{userId}, #{reason}, 'pending')
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.reporter_id, r.post_id, r.user_id, r.reason, r.status, r.created_at, r.resolved_at, r.admin_note, reporter.nickname AS reporter_nickname, p.title AS post_title, reported_user.nickname AS reported_user_nickname FROM reports r LEFT JOIN users reporter ON r.reporter_id = reporter.id LEFT JOIN posts p ON r.post_id = p.id LEFT JOIN users reported_user ON r.user_id = reported_user.id WHERE r.id = #{id}

SELECT r.id, r.reporter_id, r.post_id, r.user_id, r.reason, r.status, r.created_at, r.resolved_at, r.admin_note, reporter.nickname AS reporter_nickname, p.title AS post_title, reported_user.nickname AS reported_user_nickname FROM reports r LEFT JOIN users reporter ON r.reporter_id = reporter.id LEFT JOIN posts p ON r.post_id = p.id LEFT JOIN users reported_user ON r.user_id = reported_user.id ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
